metadata.title: CVE-2022-1212 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use-After-Free in str_escape in mruby/mruby in GitHub repositorymruby/mruby prior to 3.2. Possible arbitrary code execution if beingexploited.

criterions.comment: mruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
